episode.title: 「人を結ぶ手紙を書くのか?」
You Write Letters That Bring People Together?
「사람을 이어주는 편지를 쓰는 건가?」
"Hito o Musubu Tegami o Kaku no ka?"
episode.summary: Princess Charlotte is to have a public correspondence with her betrothed, and Violet is entrusted with writing the letters on her highness’s behalf. Source: netflix
